    • Method Detail

      • enterVisitor

        public void enterVisitor(java.lang.String id,
                         int numberOfVisitors,
                         int numberOfSubscribers)
        method that checks if visitor is allowed to enter to the park
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of visitor to be checked
        numberOfVisitors - amount of visitors who want to enter the park
        numberOfSubscribers - amount of subscribers who want to enter the park

      • updateEntry

        private void updateEntry(Order currentOrder,
                         int numberOfVisitors,
                         int numberOfSubscribers)
        creates an ParkEntry according to Order and Card
        Parameters:
        currentOrder - the entery's Order
        numberOfVisitors - amount of visitors that entered the park
        numberOfSubscribers - amount of subscribers that entered the park

        method that checks if visitor is allowed to exit to the park
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of visitor to be checked
